## Heap.max() method

Returns the largest `n` values (or less) in heap, based on comparator ordering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
max(n?: number): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T[]`
